category.name: Active Workspace Search
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: AWC_Search_Results_Word_Proximity
preference.preference_description: Defines the proximity distance between two terms in a search. This boosts results where the terms searched for fall within the specified proximity distance of eachother. The value can be set between 5 and 500. Default value is set to 10.
